oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elders' Voices
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social History
History
Local History
Communities
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: They are the ones who remember. They are the keepers of knowledge, and the living memories of ancient cultures. They are the Elders of Alberta's Aboriginal communities. Read and hear the stories of the Elders in Elders' Voices, a multimedia testament to the resilience of those who have struggled to keep the old world from being completely swept away by the new.
